Industries: E-Commerce, Food and Beverage, Retail, Wine And Spirits
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Food and Beverage
Description: Global Wine export is in the business of using social media in Asia.
Full Description: Global Wine export is in the business of using social media in Asia for exporting our private label wines which we buy directly from wineries in 1,000+ case lots both for domestic sales to distributors in the US, Europe & Asia.  By targeting both domestic and overseas markets the company can build a portfolio of wines for both markets. The company has a website in English, Chinese, Korean & Japanese to promote the sale of wines to distributors in Asia. The Chinese utilize the internet more than anyone except the Japanese.  We will use sociial media to create brand awareness.  By using private labels we can build brand awareness and maintain margins for our products rather than just be a broker of other wineries wines. This also allows us to take advantage of surlpus in the American market and purchase wines below the standard prices in the marketplace.  We market on the basis of ""percieved quality"", in other words we are not competing based on price, but on quality.  The market we are aiming for is the emerging middle class which know little about wine but are willing to learn & can afford to pay $40 USD retail for wine.  In China alone this market is about 535 million people.  Our people have worked in Chinese social media and are familar with the cultural and government requirements in that area.  We are currently shipping to Singapore. & Norway. We have an advantage...we don't own a winery!  Therefore our development costs are extremely low & we are not just brokers of other people's wine.

Description: Sociologie Wine™ began as a beloved party favorite surrounded by fun music, wonderful conversation, and lovely family friends.
Full Description: Sociologie Wine™ began as a beloved party favorite surrounded by fun music, wonderful conversation, and lovely family friends. Starting in her very own kitchen and using her entertaining soirées as inspiration, Amy customized an assortment of sophisticated wine blends tailored to each special occasion.  For many years, she graciously served refreshing wine blended to perfection with delicious fruits and delightful natural ingredients! Soon guests began requesting her yummy drinks and Amy found herself preparing and bottling her recipe as party flavors. Then, demand multiplied with each added guest at every delightful celebration! In 2011, Amy partnered with renowned New York fashion designer Brooke Hagel to design her new wine collection to be a symbol of chic soirées and style! In August 2012, served chilled and adorned in glamorous glasses, Sociologie Wine™ launched two varietals in Texas, ‘Blushing Rose’ and ‘Red Berry’. Sociologie™ sangria received a great response and a huge following because of its modern-classic look and fresh flavor that reflects a chic celebratory experience. Sociologie Wine™ premium collection of delicious wine reflects fabulous women of permissible drinking age and is currently sold in Texas and Florida.

Industries: Food and Beverage, Wine And Spirits
Description: Cerise Vineyards is a single vineyard wines crafted by the alchemy of ocean, fog, soil and patience
Full Description: Single vineyard wines crafted by the alchemy of ocean, fog, soil and patience. At Knez Winery, we believe that the deeper and more extensive our knowledge, the better our wine will be. We start with an Anderson Valley location that is epic in its richness—with maritime influences, complex soil, a near perfect amount of sun exposure and heritage clones like Martini, Pommard, David Bruce, Wädenswil and Wente. To this, we add the beauty of science—detailed analytics and painstaking research that help us make the most of our land’s bounty. We consider ourselves stewards of the land and our farming practices are sustainable and progressive. In our winemaking, we are hands-on in the vineyard and hands-off in the barrel room. Through careful stewardship of our land and attention to detail in every phase of winemaking, we are producing Chardonnay and Pinot Noir every bit as complex, expressive and ageworthy as our compatriots in Burgundy, France.

Description: For 75 years Taprite has been the preferred supplier to the world's most well known soft drink and beer brands.
Full Description: Taprite, the preferred supplier to the world's most well known soft drink and beer brands, is pleased to announce its 75th anniversary in business. Founded in 1940, Taprite opened its doors in New Jersey as "Tap-Rite", a supplier of beer dispensing equipment. Since its inception, Taprite has undergone numerous changes to solidify its position as an industry leader:     •  In 1997, Taprite merged with Standard-Keil and relocated to San Antonio, TX, under the name Taprite-Fassco to include soda dispensing equipment.     •  In 1999, Taprite-Fassco and its sister company North American Dispense (NADS), a supplier of beer-dispensing equipment, were bought by a Dutch company by the name of Aalberts Industries.     •  In 2010, Taprite-Fassco and NADS merged both soda and beer product lines under the name Taprite. Taprite has two locations in Texas; the Main capital office is in San Antonio where regulators and beer dispense products are manufactured. The second office is located in Marion, a small town 35 miles NE of San Antonio where the Taprite Ice chests are produced and BIB-Racks welded.

Industries: Wine And Spirits
Description: Qupé focuses on cool climate expressions of Rhône varietals due to a distinctive geographical feature that sets.
Full Description: Qupé focuses on cool climate expressions of Rhône varietals due to a distinctive geographical feature that sets them apart from most other regions of California, as all vineyards are all located in East-West valleys (vs North-South) which function as open windows to the cool Pacific Ocean. The benefit to the vineyards of being along the coast and running East-West is that the cold, moist air gets pulled in and creates a layer of morning cloud cover over the vines which reduces temperatures and sun exposure on the grapes. This is why cool climate varieties excel in the coastal regions of the Central Coast and allows Qupé to focus on cool climate expressions of Rhone varietals. East-West valleys on the Central Coast that Qupé sources from include Edna Valley, Arroyo Grande Valley, Santa Maria Valley, Los Alamos Valley and Santa Rita Hills/Santa Ynez Valley.

Industries: Craft Beer, Wine And Spirits
Description: Emerald City Beer Company (ECB) is fanatical about creating the Seattle Lager—a style, culture and taste that is Seattle beer.
Full Description: Emerald City Beer Company (ECB) is fanatical about creating the Seattle Lager—a style, culture and taste that is Seattle beer.  Across America, the craft beer industry is flourishing!  Washington State, most notably Seattle, is a top 5 craft beer market  that is under supplied with local lagers, ranking 11th as a state in breweries per capita. Most beer served in the US today is a lager style, pilsner, however, most craft beer is focused on ale styles.  Ales are a flavorful and bold contrast to lagers, but are certainly not intended to be crisp & easy drinking like pilsners. ECB makes craft lager beer for those who want it all, flavorful & easy drinking! ECB primarily targets the young and social crowd, individuals with an active social life, and often stressful professional life, who frequent a wide range of venues for entertainment including, restaurants, bars, sporting events, concerts, outdoor activities and various community events.  ECB has some exciting goals for the next year! We currently offer a year-around lager, and two of four planned seasonal lagers. Our year-around lager is the only style available today in 16oz aluminum cans. The plan for the next year is to release the final two seasonal lagers and put all four of the seasonal lagers into cans. We'll then release a variety pack of ten 16oz cans that includes all five different beers styles and 4-packs of the individual style when in season. ECB currently contracts the large production batches of beer with another local craft brewery in Western Washington. This allows ECB to better focus resources on building demand for our beers, instead of investing in supply assets that make them. In the next five years, we aspire to reach 15k barrels of annual production, qualifying us a regional craft-brewery. At these production volumes, it'll make sense for ECB to either sell it's brands to a larger brewer, or to build-in it's own facility, so to recapture the production margin for our investors.

Development of the Avensole vineyard was completed in 1986 by Bud Van Roekel, who planted Muscat Canelli, Cabernet Sauvignon and Zinfandel. It was Bud’s goal to spare no expense to produce the finest grapes in California. They think he succeeded, and that the grapes produced by their vineyard are the finest in Temecula, and some of the very best in all of California. Wine is meant to be enjoyed, and they believe that should include your shopping experience.  Which is why they work hard at taking the guesswork out of selecting a bottle by breaking down the intimidating walls associated with wine.  They provide detailed information, tasting notes, and food pairing recommendations for each bottle they sell, plus there is always a friendly face nearby to offer assistance if you need. Every Saturday from 2-5pm they offer tastings of selected wines, whiskeys, or beers. Past events and parties have included bridal showers, birthday parties, school fundraisers, etc.

Full Description: CaddyShanks is a unique  interactive concept, offering patrons an extensive selection of craft beers and craft wines, while also providing an array of interactive activities, keeping customers engaged while enjoying their sports and drinks. This upscale sports pub features 25+ High Definition TV's and all of the major sports packages, making it a favorite destination for sports fans. In addition to being being a first class sports pub, CaddyShanks offers customers the opportunity to engage in various entertainment options such as state-of-the-art golf simulators, pool and ping pong,  and a first of it's kind in the sports pub world, Virtual Reality and gaming room. CaddyShanks also offers popular  events like trivia night and live music. CaddyShanks  also offers a multi media room for private parties or events. Whether it's a small corporate party, or the entire venue is needed, CaddyShanks is the best place to hold your next event.   One of the most unique features of CaddyShanks is their "Virtual Kitchen", CaddyShanks partners with surrounding restaurants who participate in their "dining room extension" program, allowing us to serve a wide variety of delicious fare from surrounding restaurants while still allowing customers the full restaurant experience.   If you have not been to CaddyShanks, stop by at one of their locations and experience the "Next Generation" in interactive sports pubs.

Description: Evil City Blues is a fresh take on the downtown bar.
Full Description: Evil City Blues is a fresh take on the downtown bar. It provides curated mixology drinks and a fine wine list at an overall moderate price. Evil City Blues is a place for people who need a break from the high costs of mixology and the low costs of a screwdriver. Unlike other bars in downtown L.A., Evil City Blues provides a comfortable environment to relax, listen and dance to new music, see underground comedy or watch a cult movie. All without breaking the bank. The music and design of the bar will be cutting edge with little exception. Keeping the bar small will cater to a unique customer base that desires a different experience from the more middle of the road offerings that Downtown Los Angeles currently provides. The works of interesting graffiti and street artists will cover the walls. A large bulb lit sign of the Evil City Blues logo will light up the dance floor. The seating will be arranged with the dance floor and lighting in full view of every patron. The environment will be designed for the customer to have an Instagram opportunity at every angle. The bar will be owned and run by Lucy Stewart, current G.M. at Rivera restaurant in Downtown Los Angeles. Lucy has extensive experience in customer service and sales in the fine dining and drink business. She will partner with her husband, James Stewart and investors to establish this exciting, edgy and creative downtown bar and entertainment venue. The environment and lower than average drink cost will encourage spending and repeat visits; establishing a strong revenue and profit base for all involved.

Description: Founded in 1911, the Port of Grays Harbor became the second port district formed in Washington State.
Full Description: Founded in 1911, the Port of Grays Harbor became the second port district formed in Washington State. Once the leading export port for U.S. grown timber, Grays Harbor now leads the U.S. in exports of American grown soybean meal and is the number one seafood landing point in Washington State. While forest products remain an important piece of the Grays Harbor cargo mix, the Port has substantially diversified the products shipped through this Pacific Northwest gateway to include automobiles, biodiesel and other liquid and dry bulk products.

Industries: Craft Beer, Mobile, Wine And Spirits
Description: LetsPour's tale began back in 2009, when founder Raghav Kher was returning from a trip to Oregon's wine and beer country.
Full Description: LetsPour's tale began back in 2009, when founder Raghav Kher was returning from a trip to Oregon's wine and beer country. He realized he was spending all his free time exploring tasty craft beers and discovering new boutique wines. And, he decided, it was time to ditch his familiar world of IT to pursue his true passion for beer and wine.  Raghav's favorite way to discover a new beer or wine was to always ask his friends for recommendations. But when he wanted to explore further and buy products that weren't available locally, he discovered something was missing in the online beer and wine buying experience. There were no sites selling products centered on consumer recommendations. In a nutshell, that's how LetsPour was born!

Full Description: Whether you are looking for the cheapest drink specials, the most popular club to see and be seen, or the most authentic local dive, SloshSpot's targeted nightlife and entertainment search has your answer. SloshSpot.com is the place to go online to discover what is happening in nightlife and entertainment. Organized around locations, events, and performances, SloshSpot provides a forum for searching out, sharing experiences of, and developing an online and offline relationship with the best entertainment and nightlife spots in your hometown or travel destination around the globe. When searching for where to go and what to do for fun, partying, and entertainment, SloshSpot is the only stop you need to make on the web before your night out. When the night is over, head back to SloshSpot to share pictures, comments, and ratings of the spots you visited. Bar owners, venues, promoters, and performers can create unique and lasting relationships with their patrons and fans by creating a customized, premium presence on SloshSpot from which to promote events and services, as well as to interact with entertainment seekers the world over. Individual users can submit new spots that are not currently listed, and can even create, promote, and manage their own events through SloshSpot. With a targeted focus on nightlife and entertainment search, SloshSpot is uniquely positioned to be the site where you come when you're done working and you're ready to play. With built-in social networking features such as event planning and notification, comments and ratings, photo and video sharing, and easy integration with mobile devices, email, calendars, and existing social networks (Such as Facebook...), SloshSpot will become both an essential entertainment and event resource as well as your new online nightlife and entertainment community.

Description: Solid State Beverages LLC is currently in the process of commercial formulation of two products: alcoholic popsicles (Shotsicles).

Once commercial formulation is completed, a production facility will be identified and Solid State Beverages LLC will be able to begin production runs immediately. Commercial formulation and facility identification will be completed by the end of August 2015. Solid State Beverages LLC currently holds three trademarks and one trade name (Shotsicles) that are registered with the Secretary of State of Ohio. In order to bring its products to market, Solid State Beverages LLC will need to design product packaging, allocate funds to begin initial production runs, and begin executing developed marketing and sales plans. Solid State Beverages LLC is looking for an investment of $500,000 in order to bring its products to market within three months.

Industries: Advertising, Machine Learning, Wine And Spirits
Industry Groups: Advertising, Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Food and Beverage, Sales and Marketing, Software
Description: Winescorecard.com LLC employs highly sophisticated machine learning methods to provide the typical wine consumer with personalized wine
Full Description: Winescorecard.com LLC  employs highly sophisticated machine learning methods to provide the typical wine consumer with personalized wine recommendations.  The approach works by recording a member's past wine experiences and matching them to other users' experiences using proprietary algorithms. The resulting recommendations do not rely on having reviews from "expert" or highly educated users.  Winescorecard works best when it matches profiles from users of similar background and experience.  This makes it an ideal marketing platform as it targets the largest segment of consumers in the marketplace. Winescorecard is monetized by selling advertising on a CPM and CPC basis.

Full Description: Cuca Fresca a manufacturer and provider of organic cachaças and ready-to-serve cocktails. Created by a fourth-generation cachaça-making family, Cuca Fresca is made using age-old methods passed down for almost a century. The entire process is done at our distillery located in the heart of Minas Gerais, the world’s most famous cachaça-producing region. “Cuca Fresca”, which literally translates to “cool head” and is a Brazilian expression meaning “to be cool” or “have a chill vibe.” It was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Pleasantville, New York.

Description: Wine and Food Travel, an online magazine, is a website that shares the appreciation of life through the journey of experiencing Wine, Food
Full Description: Wine and Food Travel, an online magazine, is a website that shares the appreciation of life through the journey of experiencing Wine, Food and Travel. Here we share with you the stories and experiences of our day-to-day activities around the globe. Our intention is to educate, share, enjoy and bridge the gap between appreciating lifeâ€™s finer things and understanding its source. From meeting WWII veterans to stumbling upon old friends, we show you a glimpse of the good life and what you might be missing otherwise. We enjoy the fruits of the earth, share how itâ€™s grown and makes its way to our plate for dinner. Furthermore, we encourage our readers to enjoy the moment, travel outside of their comfort zone, and just go with the flow. Travel doesnâ€™t need to be extravagant â€“ you might be missing the best margaritas in Los Angeles located in a hole of a wall place! This website also serves as an educational resource of vegetables, herbs, fruits and highlights the creative expression of artisans. We also provide local festivals and farmers markets listings to make it easier to reach out and live well. We encourage people to appreciate the simpler things in life. Wine & Food Travel is privately funded at this time.
